对疑似急性冠状动脉综合征患者实施高灵敏度心肌肌钙蛋白 I 检测对长期结果的影响英国的研究人员评估了使用高灵敏度测定法测量心肌肌钙蛋白 I 及其对心肌梗死 (MI) 风险或其他长期结果（例如疑似急性冠状动脉综合征患者五年内死亡）的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/The-impact-of-implementing-a-high-sensitivity-assay-for-cardiac-troponin-I-on-long-term-outcomes-in-疑似急性冠状动脉综合征患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/The-impact-of-implementing-a-high-sensitivity-assay-for-cardiac-troponin-I-on-long-term-outcomes-in-疑似急性冠状动脉综合征患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f35d9bd-2a32-4cc6-b07a-926edf7f6528 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:55:00 -0500 The impact of implementing a high sensitivity assay for cardiac troponin I on long term outcomes in patients with suspected acute coronary syndrome
山姆大叔希望您……帮助阻止保险公司虚假的 Medicare Advantage 销售策略在对销售私人医疗保险优惠和药物计划的保险公司的误导性广告宣传进行前所未有的打击之后，拜登政府希望释放一种特殊武器来确保公司遵守新规则：你。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Uncle-Sam-wants-you-e280a6-to-help-stop-insurerse28099-bogus-Medicare-Advantage-sales-tropics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Uncle-Sam-wants-you-e280a6-to-help-stop-insurerse28099-bogus-Medicare-Advantage-sales-tropics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ab6573d-6298-4e76-a0cc-70890839d71e Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:47:16 -0500 Uncle Sam wants you … to help stop insurers’ bogus Medicare Advantage sales tactics

新研究提供了令人信服的证据，证明 Cylicins 在精子发育和生育能力中的重要作用研究人员通过成簇规则间隔短回文重复序列 (CRISPR)/CRISPR 相关蛋白 9 (Cas9) 基因编辑研究了 Cylicins 在小鼠和人类精子发生和男性生育能力中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/New-study-provides-concincing-evidence-of-the-essential-role-of-cylicins-in-sperm-development-and-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/New-study-provides-concincing-evidence-of-the-essential-role-of-cylicins-in-sperm-development-and-fertility.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4be5a06b-0865-41c3-8ae1-0204b2f73a9d Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:02:00 -0500 New study provides convincing evidence of the essential role of cylicins in sperm development and fertility

跨诊断、混合生态瞬时干预能否改善自尊心低且曾经历过童年逆境的青少年的自尊？ 《美国医学会杂志精神病学》上的一项新研究报告了一项为期四年的随机临床试验 (RCT) 的结果，该试验对童年时期有逆境史的年轻人进行单独常规护理或结合自拍（EMI 的一种形式）进行比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Can-a-transdiagnostic-blished-ecological-momentary-intervention-improve-self-spectr-in-youth-with-low-self-spectr-and-先前经历过的童年逆境.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Can-a-transdiagnostic-blished-ecological-momentary-intervention-improve-self-spectr-in-youth-with-low-self-spectr-and-先前暴露于童年逆境.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21b2e0d9-e7c2-48e5-8b8f-2432815232f9 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 04:27:00 -0500 Can a transdiagnostic, blended ecological momentary intervention improve self-esteem in youth with low self-esteem and prior exposure to childhood adversity?

智能手机数据揭示了快餐店与饮食相关疾病之间的联系您一天中会遇到多少家快餐店？这与您的健康有什么关系？南加州大学信息科学研究所 (ISI) 的首席科学家阿比盖尔·霍恩 (Abigail Horn) 表示，很多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Smartphone-data-reveals-the-link- Between-fast-food-outlets-and-diet-lated-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Smartphone-data-reveals-the-link- Between-fast-food-outlets-and-diet-lated-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d573d8a-5836-4f87-a063-be770fd965bd Wed, 29 Nov 2023 23:56:17 -0500 Smartphone data reveals the link between fast food outlets and diet-related diseases
